com.iLabs.spice.handler
Class ScrapHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.iLabs.pagecode.PageCodeBase
      com.iLabs.spice.handler.ScrapHandler

public class ScrapHandler
extends PageCodeBase

This class is used to handle functionality related to scrap like post scrap, show scrap, count no of scraps and delete scrap.

Author:
iLabs

public ScrapHandler()
Method Detail

getScrapCountMessage

public java.lang.String getScrapCountMessage()
This function is used to generate message which tells number of scraps of user. This message is used to display no of scraps in scrap book of a user.

Returns:
String

setScrapCountMessage

public void setScrapCountMessage(java.lang.String scrapCountMessage)
Setter for scrapCountMessage.

Parameters:
scrapCountMessage - String

scrapAction

public java.lang.String scrapAction()
This function is used to post scrap to a friend of a user using sendScrap service. senderId is retrieved from ownerProfile and recieverId is used from currentProfile.

Returns:
String

showScrap

public java.lang.String showScrap()
This function is used to display scraps of a person using getScraps service. User is redirected to the scrap book page.

Returns:
String

deleteScrap

public java.lang.String deleteScrap()
This function is used to delete scrap.

Returns:
String
